elephant-orphanage-sri-lanka.title: Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage, Sri Lanka
elephant-orphanage-sri-lanka.subject: Elephant Orphanage
elephant-orphanage-sri-lanka.description: An impressive number of elephants bathe in the river. This routine contributes to an elephant’s hygiene, comfort, and happiness.
